name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Henry CASTON, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Henry CASTON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed, 310 Pa.Super. 602, 456 A.2d 1083.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: David R. Eshelman, Reading, for appellant.
George C. Yatron, Dist. Atty., Charles M. Guthrie, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
470 A.2d 525
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Henry CASTON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 26, 1984.
Decided Feb. 3, 1984.
David R. Eshelman, Reading, for appellant.
George C. Yatron, Dist. Atty., Charles M. Guthrie, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
